func.title: GetPlrMagic

param.name: player
param.desc: Player whose magic knowledge you want to determine.

param.name: id
param.desc: With id specified the function returns true, if the specified player knows the specified spell. In this case index is ignored.

param.name: index
param.desc: With index specified the function returns the indicated spell from the player's list of known spells.

func.desc: Determines magic spell knowledge of a player.

example.text: If player 0 knows the lightning spell (MGLT), a message is displayed.
Returns the id of the fifth spell of the first player.
